title: Login server down?
body:
Tried logging in this morning but the client says "Did not receive a response from the server" Tried with my phone´s hotspot and my wifi.
Is this the same issue as yesterday? Problems for Telstra and optus?

replies.body:
Hey there,

I'm currently able to login just fine (Telstra customer here).

Could you try [switching to a public DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq5) for me.
